msbt.message: What's up, ? Looks like you're in the middle of something right now. I did want to catch up with you, but we can do it later.Someone will find you once you say goodbye to your friend.Ha HA! Doesn't that sound ominous? Don't worry, it's nothing bad.

So, uh, I know you're hanging out with right now and all But there's someone else here who needs to talk to , like, soon-ish. Yeah, I think it has to be today. Maybe it's about an audition! Anyway, it seems important. Just be sure to tell them that someone's looking for them and wants to talk to them alone. I'm 95 percent sure it's not a scam.
